summary: All three requested changes appear implemented in FinalCtaSection: the section background is set to the standard white/background token, the secondary "Contact Us Today" button is removed (with only a single primary button remaining), and the consultation availability footer text block is no longer rendered. However, the diff also adds decorative accent background elements that were not requested and may conflict with the “no redesign beyond” constraint.

hallucinated_features.description: Added decorative accent background elements (blurred accent circles) inside the CTA section.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to change the CTA section background to white and remove specific secondary elements; adding new decorative visuals is an unrequested change and could be considered a redesign beyond the specified scope.
evidence: frontend/src/components/home/FinalCtaSection.tsx (comments and elements: "{/* Decorative accent elements */}" plus two absolutely-positioned accent divs)
